answers.answer: I've had it before and my sugars were fine and diabetes runs in my moms side. Never know though since everyone is different. Good luck! :)
Ty im going to call my doc monday and ask them what they think its not going away and iv nearly passed out a couple times but ty :)
Just keep yourself fed girl lol don't get too busy and forget!
It also could mean you are anemic.  You might need to start taking iron.  I was just put on iron bc I was getting dizzy spells and headaches
It could be low blood sugar or low iron. Definitely something you want to talk to your Dr about.

It could be a few of the things stated above. But more than likely you are just dehydrated. Even if you think you are drinking enough you prob aren't as well as eating a good diet and eating often. Its easy for this to happen when your so busy exp with other children. This is my fourth pregnancy and I have two children so I myself get a bit forgetful.

I do tend to b a bit forgetful sometimes having two kids to also chase n worry about lol im trying to eat healthy n stay drinking fluids sometimes i have to make myself eat cuz i dont want anything but yes im just going to call doc and talk to them....thx :)

question: Hi ladies im 16 wks today and i have been getting the shakes plus dizziness and feeling faint the last few weeks whenever i dont eat right away when im hungry plus really bad headaches iv never had the shakes like this with my other pregnancies (this is my third) should i b concerned or is this normal? My sister in law thinks i could end up with geststational diabetes (shes a diabetic herself) and that i have the syptoms im a lil worried any info would help thx ladies...
title: should i be concerned?
